@SayGen102 you ain't from around these parts are ya?

Forgot to add mp4 to the list of good contianers, but yes mp4 is generally safe. Point is, TS is an older rarer format that has no real purpose and should be questioned when seen.

Never said anything bad about anyone, just gave a general warning to the masses-- which is the point of these comments.
